description:
Convex optimisation is an indispensable technique in
dealing with high-dimensional structured problems in data
science. The module covers modelling examples; basic
concepts for convex functions and sub-gradients; gradient
and sub-gradient methods; accelerated proximal gradient
methods; stochastic block coordinate descent methods;
Lagrangian duals; splitting algorithms and implementations.
title: Essential Data Analytics Tools: Convex Optimisation
